## Installing PrivacyUnbiased 

To install `PrivacyUnbiased`, run:

```{r, eval = FALSE}

pkgs <- c("devtools", "Matrix", "mvtnorm")

for (pkg in pkgs) {
  if (!require(pkg, character.only = T)) {
    install.packages(pkg)
    library(pkg)
  }
}

devtools::use_vignette("PrivacyUnbiased")

library(PrivacyUnbiased)

```
